title: This damage meta is getting so old. :/
body:
A summery of this meta. 

Roam bot. Miss your ENTIRE kit. 

Adc dies anyways.

replies.body: I just want for defensive stats to be worth a damn.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z3X8oPNl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-22T07:31:42.875+0000)
>
> I just want for defensive stats to be worth a damn.

I would also like to have 160 armor and 160 mr mean something as well. But riot disagrees.
